rows.label: tev023001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev023001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Monica for a hint about collectibles.

rows.label: tev023001_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev023001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Monica about recent developments.

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0001
rows.name:
I'll teach you where to find some of the collectibles that
I'm asked about most often.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0002
rows.name:
You can find California sunsets west of Biahno Lake.
They can be found near the cave there sometimes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0003
rows.name:
I hear that spherical EM motors have been
found near Noctilum's Weeping Whitewood.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0004
rows.name:
Well? Pretty useful intel right? If I come across more,
I'll let you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0009
rows.name:
I've got a creep of a cousin who works as a technician
at the maintenance center.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0010
rows.name:
Somehow, he heard that we'd been struggling with
some tough missions. Then he rang me up and said...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0011
rows.name:
"I'm sure you'll find a way to siphon more NLA money
for BLADE via missions, so try not to waste all the aid
we support staff provide you with next time!"[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0012
rows.name:
Can you believe that?! If we hadn't been talking over
a comm device, I'd have punched him in the face![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0013
rows.name:
He thinks he's better than everyone just because he
went to a slightly above-average university.
That guy seriously pisses me off so much...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0022
rows.name:
I'll teach you where to find some of the collectibles that
I'm asked about most often.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0023
rows.name:
Mysterious Nopon stones called "nopoliths" can
occasionally be found in Oblivia's Aaroy Plain,
or near the Keegan Ridge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0024
rows.name:
Spirit wands are another Nopon collectible.
Apparently they can be found in Sylvalum's
West Ciel Sandsea and Shivering Sands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0025
rows.name:
Well? Pretty useful intel right? If I come across more,
I'll let you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0026
rows.name:
I'll teach you where to find some of the collectibles that
I'm asked about most often.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0027
rows.name:
As the name suggests, chameleon sand can be found
in sandy locales like Oblivia's Aaroy Plain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0028
rows.name:
And while you're in the area, you can also find silvery
cactaceous resin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0029
rows.name:
If you're looking for Logunie's driftwood,
you can find a ton of it at Arendt Bridge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0030
rows.name:
To be honest, I learned all of this from Conner.
I just hope it'll help you do great things![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0016
rows.name:
One of my cousins is a mimeosome researcher named
Solan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0017
rows.name:
He went to some fancy college, so he always use to
scoff at BLADEs like me and say we're just pawns.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0018
rows.name:
But lately he's been acting weird. When I got back
from my last mission, he profusely thanked me for
my service.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0019
rows.name:
He even said that he had respect for the hard work
we BLADEs do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0020
rows.name:
I welcome the improvement, but I wonder what the hell
happened to him?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023001_MSG0021
rows.name:
Whatever the reason, it's nice to be able to tolerate
his company for once![ST:wait ]
